content:
ScriptControl Class

Definition

Provides an abstract base class for a script control.

In this Article

public abstract class ScriptControl : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl

Remarks

ScriptControl inherits from the WebControl class and implements the IScriptControl interface. The WebControl class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls. The ScriptControl is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class.

The ScriptControl base class tests the page for a ScriptManager control during the PreRender stage of the derived control. The ScriptControl base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the ScriptManager control to register script during the Render event. This includes registering ScriptDescriptor objects for the ScriptControl when the Render method is called. The Render method makes sure that ScriptDescriptor objects are not rendered unless the ScriptControl itself is rendered. This enables a ScriptControl to work inside a closed WebPart control.

You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from ScriptControl.

Constructors

ScriptControl()

Initializes a new instance of the ScriptControl class in a derived class.

protected ScriptControl ();

Methods

GetScriptDescriptors()

When overridden in a derived class, returns the ScriptDescriptor objects for the control.

protected abstract System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> GetScriptDescriptors ();
Returns
IEnumerable<ScriptDescriptor>

An IEnumerable collection of ScriptDescriptor objects.

GetScriptReferences()

When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.

protected abstract System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences ();
Returns
IEnumerable<ScriptReference>

An IEnumerable collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.

OnPreRender(EventArgs)

Raises the stem.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender* event and registers the script control with the ScriptManager control.

protected override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
e
EventArgs

An EventArgs object that contains the event data.

Remarks

After the PreRender event of the base class is raised, the OnPreRender method registers the script control with the ScriptManager control.

Render(HtmlTextWriter)

Raises the stem.Web.UI.Control.Render* event and sends server control content to a provided HtmlTextWriter object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.

protected override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
writer
HtmlTextWriter

The HtmlTextWriter object that receives the server control content.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IScriptControl.GetScriptDescriptors()

When overridden in a derived class, registers the ScriptDescriptor objects for the control.

System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> IScriptControl.GetScriptDescriptors ();
Returns
IEnumerable<ScriptDescriptor>

An IEnumerable collection of ScriptDescriptor objects.

IScriptControl.GetScriptReferences()

When overridden in a derived class, registers script files for the control.

System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> IScriptControl.GetScriptReferences ();
Returns
IEnumerable<ScriptReference>

An IEnumerable collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
